column1: To import a build it must be exported with "Export support" enabled in the import/export tab
column2: 要导入一个构筑，它必须在导入/导出选项卡中勾选“导出支援”后导出再使用，

column1: Auras with the highest effect will take priority, your curses will take priority over a support's
column2: 具有最高效果的光环将被优先计算，而你的诅咒则优先于支援的

column1: All of these effects can be found in the Calcs tab
column2: 所有这些效果都可以在计算选项卡中找到
在下方输入一个构筑代码/URL:

column1: Currently Links Skills do not export
column2: 当前的羁绊技能不会导出

column1: This sets the import button to append to the current party lists instead of replacing them (curses will still replace)
column2: 这会将导入按钮的功能设置为将角色附加到当前的队伍列表中，而不是替换它们(诅咒仍然会替换)。

column1: Clears all the party tab imported data
column2: 清除所有队伍选项卡内已导入的数据

column1: This shows the advanced info like what stats each aura/curse etc are adding, as well as enables the ability to edit them without a re-export
column2: 这会显示进阶信息，比每个光环/诅咒等添加的统计数据，以及无需重新导出即可编辑它们的能力

column1: Do not edit any boxes unless you know what you are doing, use copy/paste or import instead
column2: 不要编辑任何框，除非你知道你在做什么，使用复制/粘贴或导入代替

column1: Removes the effects of the supports, without removing the data
column2: 移除支援效果但不移除支援数据

column1: Use "rebuild all" to apply the effects again
column2: 使用“重建全部”以重新应用效果

column1: Reparse all the inputs incase they have been disabled or they have changed since loading the build or importing
column2: 重新解析所有输入，以应对它们被禁用或在加载构筑&导入后发生更改的情况
